title: U.S. and Iran Gear Up for Nuclear Talks Amid Rising Tensions
summary_full: President Trump has called on Iran to reach an immediate accord or else face the threat of a possible U.S. attack.
summary_public: President Trump has called on Iran to reach an immediate accord or else face the threat of a possible U.S. attack.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump has repeatedly threatened to use force to compel Iran
